article_title: DEED issues new 'Employer’s Guide to Employment Law Issues in Minnesota'

article_metadata.description: A new edition of "An Employer’s Guide to Employment Law Issues in Minnesota” is now available from the Minnesota Department of Employment and Economic Development.The new edition — the 12th — includes sections on the Affordable Care Act and health care portability.

og.description: The free overview of laws includes a new section on the Affordable Care Act.
og.title: DEED issues new 'Employer’s Guide to Employment Law Issues in Minnesota'
